home.greeting_empty_subtitle: Your Vault is ready. Here is where to begin.
home.empty_description_1: Load your first medical document to get started.
home.empty_description_2: Coheara will help you understand your health records.

home.progress_complete: All done! Your Vault is taking shape.
home.feature_documents_body: Import a prescription, lab result, or letter. Coheara reads it, names medications, flags conflicts, and builds your health timeline.
home.feature_chat_body: 'What does this result mean?' 'Do any of my medications interact?' Get cited answers from your own documents.
home.feature_journal_body: Log how you feel and spot patterns. Your journal helps you and your doctor see what's changing.
home.companion_body: Pair your phone to carry your Vault to every appointment. Medications, alerts, and summaries â€” on your phone, offline.
home.ai_setup_title: Enable AI to understand your documents
home.ai_setup_description: Set up a local AI model to get explanations, summaries, and insights from your health records.
home.onboarding_explore_more: You've mastered the basics! Explore more: Journal, Medications, Appointments
